amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to transfer funds from Health and Human Services General Department Management for the purchase and implementation of telehealth services to improve health care coordination for rural veterans between rural providers and the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
